graph.original_query: ### üß†Generate a Stunning LLM Chat UI (HTML/CSS/JS - Modular)You're an expert frontend engineer and UX designer building a **production-grade LLM Chat UI** for a **VC pitch**. Please generate a **visually stunning, light-themed UI**, split across **3 files**:* `index.html` ‚Äì the HTML skeleton* `styles.css` ‚Äì all visual styling* `script.js` ‚Äì all JavaScript logic and interactionsThis UI should feel modern, intuitive, and *ready to impress investors*.---### ‚úÖ Required Features#### üìå General* Professional layout using modern HTML5 best practices* Modular: split logic into 3 files (no inline CSS or JS)* Fully responsive (works across screen sizes)#### üé® `styles.css`* Light theme: elegant colors, good contrast, legible fonts* Transitions and subtle animations (e.g., sidebar toggle, message fade-in)* Neumorphism or glassmorphism optional but welcome* Styles for:  * Header  * Sidebar (collapsible)  * Chat messages (user & LLM)  * Buttons, dropdowns, inputs, scrollbars  * Chat bubbles, timestamps, avatar icons (optional)#### üèóÔ∏è `index.html`* Layout structure:  * Top **Header** with app name + LLM model selector dropdown  * Left **Sidebar**: collapsible + searchable chat history (list of past conversations with titles)  * Right **Main Chat Window**: scrollable list of messages  * Bottom **Input bar** with a textbox + send button* Sample simulated chat (10‚Äì15 messages)* One message should include an image/chart (use base64 or placeholder)#### üí° `script.js`* Handle:  * Sidebar toggle  * LLM model change (console log or simulate setting)  * Chat search filter  * Sending messages (append to chat window)  * Share chat (copy link to clipboard + show confirmation)* Dynamically populate LLM model dropdown using a JS array* Animate chat message appearance (e.g., fade-in on append)---### üìÅ Output FormatPlease generate 3 separate code blocks:```html<!-- index.html --><html>...</html>``````css/* styles.css */body { ... }``````javascript// script.jsdocument.addEventListener(...)```Use **realistic naming**, no placeholder lorem ipsum. Make it VC-pitch-ready ‚Äî bold, beautiful, and full-featured. Don‚Äôt skip visual polish. For reference use this attached image.

globals_schema.execution_result_T001: Generated index.html with header, sidebar, chat window, input bar, and sample simulated chat.
globals_schema.execution_result_T002: Created styles.css with light theme, transitions, and styles for various UI elements.

nodes.description: Generate HTML skeleton for the chat UI.
nodes.agent_prompt:
Generate the `index.html` file with the following structure:
*   Top **Header** with app name + LLM model selector dropdown
*   Left **Sidebar**: collapsible + searchable chat history (list of past conversations with titles)
*   Right **Main Chat Window**: scrollable list of messages
*   Bottom **Input bar** with a textbox + send button
*   Sample simulated chat (10‚Äì15 messages)
*   One message should include an image/chart (use base64 or placeholder)

Use modern HTML5 best practices. Ensure the layout is fully responsive. Use realistic naming, no placeholder lorem ipsum.

output.execution_result_T001: Generated index.html with header, sidebar, chat window, input bar, and sample simulated chat.

execution_result.execution_result_T001: Generated index.html with header, sidebar, chat window, input bar, and sample simulated chat.

nodes.description: Generate CSS for the chat UI styling.
nodes.agent_prompt:
Generate the `styles.css` file with the following requirements:
*   Light theme: elegant colors, good contrast, legible fonts
*   Transitions and subtle animations (e.g., sidebar toggle, message fade-in)
*   Neumorphism or glassmorphism optional but welcome
*   Styles for:
    *   Header
    *   Sidebar (collapsible)
    *   Chat messages (user & LLM)
    *   Buttons, dropdowns, inputs, scrollbars
    *   Chat bubbles, timestamps, avatar icons (optional)
Ensure the styling is visually stunning and reflects a modern, intuitive design.

output.execution_result_T002: Created styles.css with light theme, transitions, and styles for various UI elements.

execution_result.execution_result_T002: Created styles.css with light theme, transitions, and styles for various UI elements.

nodes.description: Generate JavaScript logic for the chat UI.
nodes.agent_prompt:
Generate the `script.js` file with the following functionality:
*   Handle:
    *   Sidebar toggle
    *   LLM model change (console log or simulate setting)
    *   Chat search filter
    *   Sending messages (append to chat window)
    *   Share chat (copy link to clipboard + show confirmation)
*   Dynamically populate LLM model dropdown using a JS array
*   Animate chat message appearance (e.g., fade-in on append)

Ensure the JavaScript logic is modular and well-documented.

nodes.description: Combine HTML, CSS, and JS to create the chat UI.
nodes.agent_prompt: Analyze the generated `index_html_T001`, `styles_css_T002`, and `script_js_T003` files. Ensure they are properly linked and functional. Identify any potential issues or improvements.

nodes.description: Review and refine the chat UI based on the analysis.
nodes.agent_prompt: Based on the UI analysis from `ui_analysis_T004`, refine the `index_html_T001`, `styles_css_T002`, and `script_js_T003` files to address any issues and incorporate improvements. Ensure the UI is visually stunning, responsive, and functional.
Create a summary of the generated chat UI, including its features, styling, and functionality. Reference `refined_html_T005`, `refined_css_T005`, and `refined_js_T005`.
